name: Squirrel

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Man, that sure was something. You're pretty brave, mungo!

topics.topic_text: Why are you called Squirrel?
topics.response_text: I like to think it's because of my inquisitive and charming nature, as well as my natural climbing ability.{Trying to sound important and cool.}

topics.topic_text: Okay, the guard's out of the way. Now get moving!
topics.response_text: Oh, don't worry. We're outta here. Me and Sammy can make it, no problem. The drain in the bathroom is small; we'll fit through, but mungos can't.

topics.topic_text: I took care of the guard. Is it safe to leave?
topics.response_text: Yep, me and Sammy can get out no problem. We're good at sneaking. They'll never spot us.

topics.topic_text: I did my part. You're on your own now.
topics.response_text: Thanks, I guess. Me and Sammy should be able to make it out of here now.

topics.topic_text: What? Why won't she leave?
topics.response_text: This mungo, Rory Maclaren. She got all sweet on him or something. I dunno, it's some stupid girl thing.

topics.topic_text: What the hell is her problem?
topics.response_text: Beats me. I don't get girls at ALL.

topics.topic_text: Maybe I can talk to her. Can you tell me what's going on?
topics.response_text: She went all soft on Rory Maclaren. He's this guy that got captured. Not bad for a Mungo, but Penny really likes him.

topics.topic_text: Let's just say Forty won't be bothering you or anyone else again.
topics.response_text: Hey hey, look at Mr. Mungo!{impressed}

topics.topic_text: How am I supposed to get rid of the guards?
topics.response_text: Man, can't you think of anything on your own?

topics.topic_text: No luck yet.
topics.response_text: Come on, mungo! How hard can it be?

topics.topic_text: Forget it. This is ridiculous.
topics.response_text: This is bull, man. You gotta help us out.

topics.topic_text: Okay, I'm on it.
topics.response_text: Okay. Don't do anything stupid.

topics.topic_text: Pipe down, shorty. I'm going to take care of it.
topics.response_text: What's the matter, mungo? Can't handle it?

topics.topic_text: If she won't go, maybe it's time to leave her behind. You can't save everyone.
topics.response_text: Yeah, maybe you're right. Me and Sammy can leave, at least.

topics.topic_text: Okay, great. What's next?
topics.response_text: Well, with the terminal, I can turn off the collars and open the gate. But they're not gonna just let us walk out of here, you know?

topics.topic_text: "One step"? What the hell, kid.
topics.response_text: Hey mungo, I never said the terminal was the only thing we'd need to do. It's important, but it won't get us out that front gate.

topics.topic_text: I'm getting tired of this.
topics.response_text: Hey, if you got any better ideas, you go right ahead and get to work. Me? This is the best I got.

topics.topic_text: So what do I do?
topics.response_text: Hell, I dunno. Go talk to her. Try and get her to get out while she can.

topics.topic_text: Why is this my problem?
topics.response_text: Hey, you're the one that said you wanted to get us out of here.

topics.topic_text: I'm with you so far. Keep going.
topics.response_text: So I found this old terminal in the building here. Dusty, but it turns on with a little fixing. Like I said, I'm super smart.

topics.topic_text: Skip to the point, short stuff.
topics.response_text: Fine. But I'm telling you, it's good stuff. Really.

topics.topic_text: Okay, tell me the whole plan. All of it.
topics.response_text: Okay, cool. You'll like it, really. It's going to work, I know it.

topics.topic_text: I just need to know what to do right now.
topics.response_text: Man, you're cranky.{annoyed}

topics.topic_text: I'm not that good with computers...
topics.response_text: Oh, come on. Aren't you mungos good for anything? I'm a kid, and I can do it. Why can't you?{annoyed}

topics.topic_text: Isn't there another way to get you out?
topics.response_text: You're really dumb, aren't you?

topics.topic_text: Your plan is crazy. I'm not doing it.
topics.response_text: Great. Then that means we're still stuck in here, and you're an asshole.

topics.topic_text: Okay, I'll see what I can do.
topics.response_text: Gee, thanks. Don't work too hard, okay?{extremely sarcastic}

topics.topic_text: All done. The terminal should work for you now.
topics.response_text: All right! You're okay for a mungo, you know that?

topics.topic_text: Yeah, it's working. Am I done now?
topics.response_text: Nope. Good job on the terminal, but we're only one step of the way there.

topics.topic_text: Maybe... Why don't you go for a jog and see if your head explodes.
topics.response_text: Ha ha. Real funny, mungo.

topics.topic_text: Where's the terminal I need to use?
topics.response_text: I told you, it's in the boss guy's room. You gotta sneak in there or something. That's up to you to figure out, mungo.

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: Penny's one of us. She's gotta come too.

conversation.response_text: Ha ha! We're outta that shitbox!
Can I have mine without much dirt on it? I think I'm allergic.
I think I'm catching a cough. But I'll be fine.{A couple weak coughs}
Yeah, I see. Catch you later, I guess.{A couple weak coughs}
Just playing around, you know?{A couple weak coughs}

description:
Squirrel (Peter) is a 13 year-old Caucasian Male.

A 13-year-old boy from Little Lamplight, now enslaved in Paradise Falls. Squirrel is exceptionally talented with computers and electronics, making him a valuable member of any scavenging team. His inquisitive nature earned him his nickname, though some say it's because he's 'nuts'. Despite his circumstances, he maintains his wit and intelligence.

Squirrel (Peter)'s Personality: Resourceful, intelligent, inquisitive, and resilient. Squirrel maintains a positive outlook despite his enslavement and is always looking for ways to improve his situation. He values friendship and loyalty, especially toward his best friend Sammy.

Squirrel (Peter)'s Backstory: Born and raised in Little Lamplight, Squirrel showed an early aptitude for technology and electronics. He became an essential member of the community's scavenging teams, able to identify valuable tech amidst the ruins of the pre-Washington D.C. area. His friendship with Sammy, another Lamplight resident, was one of the few constants in his life. In 2277, Squirrel was betrayed by Rip Smithy, who sold him into slavery at Paradise Falls. Despite his captivity, Squirrel has been secretly working on an escape plan, leveraging his technical skills to survive and plot his freedom.
